    Introducing This article discusses how to perform ARP spoofing and local DNS hijacking in an IPv4 LAN environment. ARP spoofing is a common Man-in-the-Middle (MITM) attack that can be combined with DNS hijacking to redirect traffic within a network, potentially leading to further malicious actions.
